modName: Conduct the Song of the Dragonborn
summary: This mod allows you to conduct the Song of the Dragonborn by directing a FULLY VOICED CHOIR.  Equip Dovahkiin's Baton, and the choir will sing when you swing!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Arial]This mod allows you to conduct the Song of the Dragonborn.  Equip [color=#ffff00][size=3]DOVAHKIIN'S BATON[/size][/color], and the [color=#ffff00][size=3]FULLY VOICED CHOIR[/size][/color] will sing when you swing!  The mod is a celebration of the amazing music that Jeremy Soule composed for Skyrim, and is designed to be fun and engaging for everyone.  The mod adds HUNDREDS of sound assets as well as some weapons and spells. 

[color=#ffff00][size=3]VIDEO: [/size][/color]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CCzVHL98e1Y

[youtube]CCzVHL98e1Y[/youtube]

CONDUCTING ONLY WORKS IN FIRST PERSON MODE.  IN THIRD PERSON, THE ANIMATIONS ARE NOT QUICK ENOUGH.


[size=3][u][color=#ffff00]FEATURES[/color][/u]:
[/size][/font][list]
[*][font=Arial][size=3]A FULLY VOICED CHOIR THAT RESPONDS TO YOUR CONDUCTING[/size][/font]
[*][font=Arial][size=3]HUNDREDS OF SOUND ASSETS[/size][/font]
[*][font=Arial][size=3]A NEW AREA, THE CHOIR REHEARSAL ROOM[/size][/font]
[*][font=Arial][size=3]A DUBSTEP SPELL[/size][/font]
[*][font=Arial][size=3]SEVERAL OTHER SPELLS AND ORIGINAL WEAPONS[/size][/font]
[*][font=Arial][size=3]SOME BOOKS, BUT THESE ARE NOT AS GOOD AS THE DUBSTEP SPELL BELIEVE ME[/size][/font]
[*][font=Arial][size=3]NO DLC REQUIRED[/size][/font]
[/list]
[font=Arial][size=3][u][color=#ffff00]WHERE DO I FIND IT?[/color][/u][/size]
The entrance to the rehearsal room is found just outside the entrance to the Bard's College, as shown in the images section of this page.

[u][color=#ffff00][size=3]INSTALLATION[/size][/color][/u]:
This mod works with the VANILLA game, [color=#ffff00][size=3]NO DLC required[/size][/color]. You can download the zip manually, extract the file, and place the esp and bsa file in the Skyrim Data folder, or try with the NMM.  Just ensure that in Data Files of the Skyrim launcher the mod is active.  THERE IS A NON-ESSENTIAL SEQ FILE WHICH CAN BE ACQUIRED ON THIS PAGE.  ALL THIS DOES IS ALLOW SOME EXTRA DIALOGUE.  This is available separately as the Creation Kit would not let me include it with the main bsa archive.

[color=#ffff00]LASTLY: [/color]When you enter the rehearsal room, the current backing track (original Skyrim music) [b][i]should[/i][/b] stop playing.  If you still hear the original 'city explore' music upon entering the room, leave the room and enter it again and it should work - this is a minor bug, sometimes it happens.

[color=#ffff00][size=4]HAVE FUN MY FELLOW DOVAHCONDUCTORS![/size][/color]  and if you liked it don't forget to endorse ;)
[/font]


[font=Arial]Steam Workshop link:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=548209973[/font][font=Arial]
